lead_paragraph: Goldman Sachs is considering a £300 million ($480 million) takeover of Paternoster, a pension business put up for sale this summer, according to press reports.
snippet: Goldman Sachs is mulling a £300 million ($480 million) takeover of Paternoster, the specialist pension business put on the block this summer, according to press reports.

headline.main: Goldman Said to Weigh $480 Million Bid for Paternoster

abstract: Goldman Sachs is mulling a £300 million ($480 million) takeover of Paternoster, the specialist pension business put on the block this summer, according to press reports.
